column2: Univision to buy Gawker out of bankruptcy for $135 million NEW YORK Univision Holdings Inc won a bankruptcy auction on Tuesday to acquire U.S. internet publisher Gawker Media LLC for $135 million
column3: outbidding media company Ziff Davis LLC
column4: which had made an initial offer of $90 million.
